entry.title: Current Conditions: -27.7°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Indian Head AAFC 09:00 AM CST Saturday 24 December 2022
Temperature: -27.7°C
Pressure / Tendency: 104.0 kPa rising
Humidity: 75 %
Wind Chill: -31
Dewpoint: -30.8°C
Wind: E 3 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Saturday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 20.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Clearing this afternoon. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 this morning. High minus 20. Wind chill near minus 34. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday night: Snow. Low minus 24 with temperature rising to minus 15 by morning.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Increasing cloudiness after midnight then snow. Blowing snow at times. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 increasing to 40 gusting to 60 this evening. Low minus 24 with temperature rising to minus 15 by morning. Wind chill minus 39 this evening and minus 26 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday: Snow. High minus 13 with temperature falling to minus 17 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Snow ending in the afternoon then cloudy. Blowing snow at times in the afternoon. Amount 5 cm. Wind southeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light in the morning. Wind becoming northwest 40 gusting to 60 near noon. High minus 13 with temperature falling to minus 17 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 20 in the morning and minus 30 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Saturday 24 December 2022
